title: Developing Civic Competencies for a Smart Society: Transformational Competency-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners assume the role of ordinary citizens and engage in project-based learning using real-time collaboration tools and open data. Conducted in a BYOD environment, it develops civic competencies through intensive practice and discussions over one week

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of civic engagement platforms (e.g., GovTech/Civic Tech) in a smart society and analyze real-world cases
Learners can design prototypes for solving community problems by applying design thinking and agile methodologies
Learners can plan and execute citizen-led projects using open data and collaboration tools, then present and evaluate the outcomes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
